2.「なんで みつからへんのや。| ウチの情報が 間違うてたんか？| いや そんなは: Why can't I find it? Was my information wrong?|No, that can't be it.

3.「あらまぁ 精が出ますなぁ。| もしかして 探してはるのは これやろか？: Oh, my, he's very energetic. Perhaps this is|what you're looking for?

Well...of course. Even I was the chieftain of|the Yinshu. I naturally know about the past|disasters and the dangers of the techniques|
|used by the Yinshu.

7.「秘術についても 調べさせてもろたわ。| まさか オウマが 研究しておったとは: I also looked into the secret arts. I was|surprised that Ouma had studied it, but I|guess I was too late.

8.「ウチが カミハルムイの宿屋で 話を聞いた時| 教えてくれたって よかったやん。: I'm glad you told us when we talked to you at|the Inn in Kamiharmui. My own grandson asked|for it.

9.「……あかん。| お前は あの陽衆の娘に肩入れしとる。| ロクなことにならんのは: Oh no. You're in love with that Yang Clan|girl. I knew it wouldn't end well.

10.「それに これは お前が 陽衆のヤツらなんかと| 仲良うしてるから 起こったこと: Besides, this is what happens when you are|friends with those Yang Clan guys.

11.「あのアサヒとつるんで ニコニコしおって。| 陽衆に毒されて 陰衆としての誇りを:
You're smiling while hanging out with that|Asahi. Have you been so poisoned by the Yang|Clan that you have lost your pride as a member|
|of the Yin Clan?

13.「私の孫ともあろう者が こんな不始末を| しでかすとは 正直 思っとらんかったわ: I honestly never thought that my grandson|would mismanage things like this. That's|precisely why...

14.「これは そんなフヌけた孫を 野放しにしとった| 私の責任でもある。アサヒごと:
This is my fault for letting such a foolish|grandson go free. I'll bury the monster with|Asahi, and settle the fate of the people in|
|the shadows.

15.「あかん！| あの子は…… アサヒは ウチが助ける。| どうか その書をウチに…: Oh no! That boy... we'll save Asahi. Please,|give me the book...

16.「話になりまへんな。それに この秘術の書には| 陰果の罪業を倒す方法は 書かれと:
That's not much of a story. Besides, this Book|of Secrets does not describe how to help the|owner of the body, even though it does|
|describe how to defeat the Sin of Yin/Yang.

17.「私の息子…… オウマでも| その方法は 見つけられんかったようやね。| どのみ: My son, even Ouma couldn't find a way to do|that. In any case, Asahi will not be saved.

18.「ウソやろ……。| ほんなら どないしたら ええねん……。: You're kidding... then what am I supposed to|do...

19.「身体をのっとられたのが アサヒでよかったわ。| お前は おとなしく 待っとき。: I'm glad it was Asahi who took my body. You|just wait and see. I'll take care of|everything.

21.「シノノメおじちゃん！？| こんな 遠い所まで どないしたん？: Uncle Shinonome! What are you doing so far|away from here?

22.「悲劇は くり返されようとしている。| 陽衆と陰衆は また引き裂かれるのか……。: The tragedy is about to be repeated. Yang Clan|and Yin Clan will be torn apart again...

23.「オウマ…… オウマよ。| どうか チカラを 貸しておくれ。: Ouma... Ouma. Please lend me your strength.

24.「ヨイちゃん。よく聞きなさい。| オウマの秘術の研究には 続きがあった。| アイ: Yoi. Listen carefully. There was more to|Ouma's mystical research. He was trying to|save everything.

25.「どうか 記憶をたどり 夢幻の森に……。: Please, follow your memories to Dream|Forest...

26.「おじちゃん？ シノノメおじちゃん！？| 夢幻の森？ 夢幻の森に 何か あるんや: Uncle? Uncle Shinonome! Dream Forest? There's|something in the Dream Forest, isn't there?

27.「……ひとつ 心あたりがある。夢幻の森の奥の| 北西の方角には 小さなほこらがあ:
I have an idea. There's a small dustbowl in|the northwest corner of the back of Dream|Forest. Would please check it|
|out?

28.「ウチは シノノメおじちゃんを| 家に送ってから すぐに追いかける。| ええね？: I'm going after Uncle Shinonome right after I|drop him off at home. Right? The northwest|corner of Dream Forest, right?

29.「<pc>。合流できて よかった。| ちゃんと ほこらを 見つけられたんやね。: <pc>. I'm glad we could meet up. I'm|glad you were able to find the fort.

30.「やっぱり ここや……。| ウチは 子供の頃 父上に連れられて| この場所に 来: I knew this was the place... my father used to|take me here when I was a kid...

31.「あの頃は ここがなんのための場所か| わからんかったけど 父上は ここで| 陽: Back then, I didn't know what this place was|for, but my father was here studying secret|arts for the Yang Clan and the Yin Clan...

32.「父上 どんな思いやったんやろう？| 陰衆として しいたげられながら それでも|: Father, how did you feel? He was treated like|a member of the underworld, and yet he still|held hands with Uncle Shinonome...

33.「おじちゃんに 嫉妬することは なかった？| 悔しくて 真っ黒な気持ちを| 心に: Were you ever jealous of your uncle? Did you|never have blackened feelings of regret in|your heart?

34.「ウチな……ずっと 考えてたんや。| テンオツ貴人に 未熟な頭領や言われたこと…: I've been thinking. What Nobleman Tenotsu|called me an immature chieftain... and what|Grandma said was my fault...

35.「吹っ切れたように 見せかけて 表面だけ| 取りつくろって ほんまは ウチ アサ: They tried to make it look like they were over|it, but the truth is that they didn't really|believe in Asahi. I thought.

36.「きっと ウチの中にある そんな黒い感情が| 気づかんうちに あふれだして 陰果:
I'm sure that black feeling inside of us must|have overflowed without us realizing it, and|we were taken advantage of by the sin of|
|Yin/Yang...

38.「……これ。父上の手記や。| 見てみ <pc>。一緒に読んでみようや。: ...this. Father's journal. Take a look|<pc>. Let's read it together.

39.<center>シノノメは すごい！|いつも明るく 誰に対しても 接し方を変えな:
Shinonome is amazing! She is always cheerful|and never changes her attitude toward anyone.|She treats me, a member of the shadows, as an|
|equal.

40.<center>話していると楽しくて お互いを認め合える。|陰衆としての自分を:
We enjoy talking with each other and we|appreciate each other. I even think that I was|the only one who looked down on myself as a|
|"shady" person.

41.<center>シノノメとなら 天地雷鳴士の未来を変えられる。|そんな風に信頼で:
With Shinonome, I can change the future of|Tenchi Druid. Finding a friend I can trust|like that is my own personal good fortune that|
|none of the past chieftains of the Yinshu had.

44.「……せや。| ウチ アサヒといると楽しくて 自然と| アサヒと一緒にいる時間が: I enjoyed spending time with Asahi. I enjoyed|spending time with Asahi, and naturally I|liked spending time with him.

45.「確かに ウチの心の中に アサヒへの嫉妬や羨望| そういった感情があるのは 認め: I admit that I have feelings of jealousy and|envy toward Asahi. I also admire Asahi for|doing things that I can't do.

46.「せやけど そんなアサヒのこと| 素直に 認めることができた時| ウチ 自分のこ: But when I was able to honestly admit that to|Asahi, I felt proud of myself.

47.「陽衆と陰衆が 手を取り合うことは| 絶対に 間違いなんかやあらへんって| ウチ: I myself want to prove that there is|absolutely nothing wrong with Yang Clan and|Yin Clan working hand in hand!

49.「せや！ | アサヒを救う 手掛かりを見つけんと。: Yes! We have to find a way to save Asahi.

50.<center>陰果の罪業に 身体をのっとられる段階までいくと|事態の解決は 難:
When a person's body is taken over by the Sin|of Yin/Yang, it is difficult to resolve the|situation. This is because it is not easy to|
|recover the ego of the original owner of the|body.

54.「マロは シノノメ殿に頼まれて| ここまで ヨイ殿と <pc>殿を| 呼びにきた: Maro was asked by Shinonome to come here to|call Yoi and <pc>.

55.「おふたりとも 早く| カムイラの穴に 向かうでおじゃる～！: You two, head for Kamuira Hole as fast as you|can!

|Chacha.

72.「アサヒ！ アサヒ！！| ウチや ヨイや！| ウチの声が 聞こえてるんやろ？: Asahi! Asahi! It's me, Yoi! I know you can|hear me.

74.「……こんなもん なんってこと あ…らへん。| アサヒを 助けるた…めやっ…たら: This is nothing. If I save Asahi I'll get back|up again and again...

81.「せやな。ウチが アサヒのこと信じへんかったら| 誰が アサヒのこと 信じるんや: That's right. If we don't believe in Asahi,|who will believe in Asahi? Thank you|<cs_pchero>.

82.「アマツカミト チギリカワシ チカラヲモツテ| アサカゼ ユウカゼ フキハラウゴ: Amatsukamito chigirikawashi chikara wo motte|asakaze yuukaze fukihara ugotokusubetenotsumi|uchiharai tamae!

86.「アホちゃうか！| こんな時にまで 人のことばっかり。| 無事やなかったのは あ: You're an idiot! Even at a time like this,|you're always talking about other people.|You're the one who wasn't safe.

88.「これは ウチの弱さが招いたことや。| あんたが 謝ることなんて なんもあらへん: This was caused by our weakness. You have|nothing to apologize for.

92.「……アホか。| あんたって やっぱり アホがつくほどの| お人好しやわ……。: You're an idiot.... You're such a softy after|all...

96.「また何か 不始末を起こしたら| すぐ来ますさかい せいぜい おきばりやす。: If we see any more misbehavior, we will come|back soon, so please be sure to be at your|best.

100.「まったく。親子そろって| 同じ未来を願うなんて その あきらめの悪さ| いった: I know... I wonder who it was that gave up on|me...

102.「冗談言わんといて。| ほな またな。: Don't joke about it. I'll see you later.

103.「これで 一件落着や！| ほっとしたら お腹すいたわー。: Now the case is closed! I'm so relieved, but|I'm hungry.

104.「ゆーえーにー！| 帰ろか。ウチらの家に。: Yeeeeeeeeeeeee! Let's go home. Let's go back|to our house.

106.「アサヒ。あんた そんな すぐ動いて| 身体のほうは 大丈夫なん？: Asahi. Are you okay to move so quickly?

108.「ねねねっ。それより あたし| ヨイちゃんに 聞きたいことがあるの。: I want to ask you something. I want to ask Yoi|something.

109.「あたし てっきり ヨイちゃんが 想望華で| おまじないをしたのは 好きな人がで: I thought Yoi did the spell at Soumohana|because she had found someone she liked...

113.「いや……。正確には 願ったことは| ちょっと ちゃうんやけど……。: Well... not exactly what I wished for, but...

116.「えー。なんでー？ 気になるぅ。| ヨイちゃん 教えて？: What? Why? I'm curious. Yoi, can you tell me?

118.「……アサヒや。ご飯は まだかのう？: Asahi. Is the rice ready yet?

120.「……<pc>。| あんたも あの花に| ウチが願ったこと 気になる？<yesn: ...<pc>. Do you care what we wished|for that flower, too?<yesno><close>

121.「あんたも 素直や あらへんね。| ほんまは 気になってはるんやろ？| あんたに: You're not so honest yourself, are you? You're|really curious, aren't you? I'll make a|special effort to tell you.

122.「……ほうか。| あんたになら 特別に 教えてあげてもええ。: Oh, well. I'll make a special effort to teach|you.

123.「この花に ウチが 願ったのは| これからも アサヒとウチと <pc>| ３人の:
What we wish for this flower is that the|friendship between Asahi, us, and| three persons will continue|
|forever... will continue...

125.「最後に呼びかけた あの時 アサヒは| 自我を 取りもどせたんやないかって。: I called out to him for the last time,|thinking that maybe that was the moment when|Asahi regained his ego.
